author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET
description: Function specific DAOs that provide services to DAOs can form the basis for exponential DID growth however DAOs require a legal framework.
solution: Create a Wyoming DAO LLC, DAO Net, that will contain function specific DAOs that will provide incubation and accelerator services for DAOs.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
